mapper.select: select a.datelist, case when b.total2 is null then 0 else b.total2 end total2, case when b.total1 is null then 0 else b.total1 end total1 from (select datelist from calendar where datelist >= #{startCutoffDate,jdbcType=DATE} and datelist <= #{endCutoffDate, jdbcType=DATE}) a left join (select cutoff_date ,sum(extract2) total2, sum(extract1) total1 from record where cutoff_date >= #{startCutoffDate,jdbcType=DATE} and cutoff_date <= #{endCutoffDate, jdbcType=DATE} and is_cutoff = 1 group by cutoff_date) b on a.datelist = b.cutoff_date order by datelist asc
